```{r num1}
vecA <- c(1,2,3,4,5) 
matA <- matrix(0, nrow = 5, ncol = 5) 

for (i in 1:5){ 
  for (j in 1:5){ 
    matA[i,j] <- abs(vecA[i]-vecA[j]) #
  }
}

print(matA) 

```


```{r num2}
asterisks <- "" 
for(i in 1:5){  
asterisks <- paste(asterisks, "*") 

cat(asterisks, "\n")
}

```

```{r num3}
# Get input from user
n <- as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the number of terms: "))

# Initialize variables
a <- 0
b <- 1

# Print Fibonacci sequence
print(b)  # first term of the sequence

repeat {
  c <- a + b
  if (c > 500) {  # exit loop if next term is greater than 500
    break
  }
  print(c)
  a <- b
  b <- c
}
```
